globals.legal1: Contracts for Difference (CFDs) and margin trading involves a high level of risk and is not suitable for everyone. You should carefully consider your objectives, financial situation, needs and level of experience before entering into any margined transactions with FXzio, and seek independent advice if necessary. CFDs are highly leveraged products, which means both gains and losses are magnified. You should only trade in these products if you fully understand the risks involved and can afford to incur losses.
globals.legal2: FXzio Ltd, incorporated in the Republic of the Marshall Islands (Reg. No. 11962). Note – the Republic of the Marshall Islands does not provide a specific licence to provide CFDs. Rather, each country that a person trades in has a particular legal framework, which FXzio Ltd considers when agreeing to onboard customers.
globals.legal3: The information on this site is not directed at residents of the following countries: United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, and other jurisdictions are not intended for distribution to, or use by, any person in any country or jurisdiction where such distribution or use would be contrary to local law or regulation.

instance-1.main-title: A broker made for traders by traders
instance-1.content: Beyond a mere slogan, it’s a declaration of purpose. FXzio emerged from the collective passion of experienced traders, driven by the challenge to offer a comprehensive trading environment.We’re dedicated to exceeding expectations in every aspect of the trading experience, from customer service and education to risk management and access to essential trading tools.

MetaTrader 5 is the latest platform by Metaquotes aimed at traders looking for state-of-the-art features. The platform comes with many additional advantages, including 21 timeframes, 6 pending order types, hedging and netting options and multi-thread strategy tester for EAs.

Experience the freedom and flexibility you’ve always desired when entering the markets via the MT5 app or website. Our platform equips you with the essential tools to make informed decisions and capitalize on market opportunities.
Unlock the key to successful trading with our comprehensive analysis of competitive spreads and rates. Start your journey to financial success today.

instance-1.main-content: Explore our comprehensive FAQ section to find answers to common queries about our services, products, and trading platform. If you have a question, you’re likely to find the answer here.
instance-1.Q1: How do I apply for an accounton FXZIO and what are the requirements?
instance-1.AQ1: To open a live account, certain general requirements must be fulfilled. Applicants must be of legal age, which is 18 years or older at the time of application. Additionally, they should have an operational mobile number and a valid email address. A government-issued passport or photo ID is necessary, along with a lawful residential address. In some cases, compliance may request additional documentation for verification.
instance-1.Q2: How long does it take to set up an account?
instance-1.AQ2: Setting up a demo account is quick, taking just a couple of minutes without any document submission. For live accounts, the application typically takes 2 to 5 minutes. Verification usually requires around 3 minutes, but may take longer if additional information is necessary or if submitted documents are invalid.
instance-1.Q3: Can I open more than one live account?
instance-1.AQ3: Absolutely, you can create up to 10 live trading accounts, with a limit of 5 accounts per MT5 platform. Each account will go through its own document verification process and requires individual approval. Should you need more than 10 accounts, please contact your account manager or reach out to our Customer Support team via live chat or email at {email}
instance-1.Q4: How are my funds held with FXzio?
instance-1.AQ4: Client funds are securely held in dedicated banking facilities, specifically designated for FXzio clients. These funds are kept in separate bank accounts, following our stringent internal protocols designed in accordance with industry best practices. Daily reconciliation is performed to maintain accuracy, and these funds are never used for operational purposes. Furthermore, we undergo external audits annually to ensure transparency and compliance. For detailed information, please refer to our Legal Documentation page.
